title: Drawing, "Design for Lady's Desk", 1934
medium: Graphite, color pencil on tracing paper
inscribed:
At left: JB trademark stamp
Center: LETTER JAN 30th 1934
Right: B. 120./LADIES DESK./ L.48 1/2. H. 48 1/4, D 14" 
In margin: left, Domensions - Right, N.Y. Jan 30th 1934. JB (initials)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Lady's desk consisting of two large double doors at top, two thin drawers below, large knee hole space.  At sides, x-shaped shelf or handle.  A small open box on top of desk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Lady's Desk", 1934.
1934. Graphite, color pencil on tracing paper. Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 2003-15-4.
